allow: Bash(claude --context "agents/claude_cli/frontend/CLAUDE.md" --system "You are a Frontend Developer expert" "Create a simple React component file called HelloWorld.jsx that displays ''Hello from Frontend Agent!''")

Bash(claude --print "Create a simple React component called A2ADemo.jsx that makes an HTTP request to http://localhost:8021/api/message and displays the response. Use fetch API and handle loading/error states.")
